CustomField.description: This field is automatically set by LLC_BI__RealEstate_Type__c via a formula. This field is a text (true or false) field that is used to specify whether the product is considered a Real Estate type.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: T/F -If the real estate picklist value is none, then set this field to "false", if there is a RE type selected, then set this field to "true"
CustomField.label: Real Estate
